(Simplified: 鳔)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 票 indicates the sound; 魚 (fish) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 魚 [ yú ] fish
    • 票 [ piào ] bank note; ticket; vote; a slip of paper
①某些魚類體內可以漲縮的氣囊，魚藉以沉浮。有的魚類的鰾有輔助聽覺或呼吸等作用。俗稱“魚泡”。
②用鰾或豬皮熬製的膠：鰾膠。豬皮鰾。
③用鰾膠粘上：把凳子腿鰾上。
鰾膠 [ biào jiāo ]: isinglass; fish glue

鰾字的基本解释

鰾
piào
见“鳔”。

鰾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biào］
［《廣韻》苻少切，上小，並。］
“鳔1”的繁体字。
(1)鱼鳔。多数鱼体内可以涨缩的囊状器官。鳔内充有氧、二氧化碳和氮，收缩时鱼下沉，膨胀时鱼上浮。
(2)鳔胶。
(3)方言。用鳔胶黏结。引申为紧密地集聚。
(4)河豚的别名。
(5)方言。赌赛。

鰾字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鰾； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1477第11
【廣韻】符少切【集韻】婢小切，?音摽。魚鰾。可作膠。【類篇】魚胞也。又【本草】鱁鮧魚。一名鰾。

swim bladder
Basic explanation of words
swim bladder
piào
See "Bladder".
swim bladder
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biào］
["Guangyun" Fu less cut, upper small, combined. ]
Traditional characters for "鳔1".
(1) Fish maw. A sac-like organ that can expand and contract in most fish. The swim bladder is filled with oxygen, carbon dioxide and nitrogen. When it contracts, the fish sinks, and when it expands, it floats.
(2) Swimming bladder glue.
(3) Dialects. Bond with swim bladder glue. The extension is close gathering.
(4) The alias of pufferfish.
(5) Dialects. Gambling.
swim bladder
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Hai Collection】【Fish Character Department】　鳔; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1477 Page 11
[Guang Yun] Fu Shaoqie [Ji Yun] Maid Xiaoqie, "Yin". Fish maw. Can be used as glue. 【Classes】Fish cells are also. And 【Materia Medica】Greekfish. A swim bladder.
